val:
I'm Max Nikitin

Software Engineer with 3+ years of experience specializing in JS and primarily building projects in React and Node. Co-creator of formaBull, a developer tool for form creation. Contributor to the open-source community. Presenter on Testing Frameworks at SingleSprout Speaker Series 2021. 🌱 In my spare time I`m learning NextJS/GatsbyJS and Python

💬 Ask me about React Hooks/Context API and CSS

📫 How to reach me nikitinmax2300@gmail.com

⚡ Love flying drones and traveling with my loved ones ❤️
